description:
One of the most comprehensive personal growth courses here on Udemy.
Are you ready to learn the incredible truth about life and well-being?
Learn how to unleash the power of your energy for better health, improved relationships and change your life forever.
If you're even remotely interested in living a better quality of life then you can't afford to miss out on Jayne's unique insights and wisdom.

Discover how your energy impacts everything in your life from your health to your relationships to your level of success.

  • Master the essential steps to a better quality of life
  • Live in alignment with your true self
  • Experience a new and inspired perspective on your life
  • Manage your energy more effectively so you can accomplish what you want
  • Improve the quality of your energy and the quality of your life
  • Reduce stress, understand, activate and recharge your energy
  • Recognize that you don't just have energy, you are energy
  • Explore the boundaries of your own consciousness beyond the limitations of time and space
  • Enrich your mind, body and spirit.

Develop a greater understanding of how to thrive in all aspects of your life.
There is value inside for the beginner, intermediate and advanced traveler on this road of life.
In this course you'll learn the essential principles of your own energy system, you'll also benefit from Jayne Warrilow's 25+ years working in the field of human change and development.

As a Master Coach Jayne understands the power of energy within many different contexts from life and relationships to leadership and business. When you take this course you will receive privileged access to Jayne's unique coaching wisdom.
Whether you already have a knowledge of energy or just simply an idea that there is more to life to be explored, you'll find value in the way this course breaks down the various levels of energy in an easy and understandable manner with plenty of exercises, tips and tools not to mention the wisdom from a seasoned coach.

In the introduction Jayne sets the record straight on what really works, what you need to get the best results to develop your energetic intelligence and activate your life.
A guided tour of your energy system to lead you step by step to become more aware of your energy, shift into alignment and start seeing some real results.
An exploration of the energetic world, the world you can't see, touch, taste or smell is the foundation on which all else rests.
Interactive exercises and diagnostic coaching tools; Explore what it means to live into your full energetic potential.

After completing this course you will understand a range of time tested strategies and have gained practical advice that advice that takes you deeper within to unlock your authentic self and gain the clarity and confidence needed to create the life you want to live.
title: Energetic Intelligence: How Energy Impacts Your Life
